name: Lentil Soup
description: Lentil soup is a hearty and comforting dish made with lentils as its main ingredient. It's a versatile soup that can be adapted to different tastes and dietary needs.
ingredients: 1 cup dried green or brown lentils, rinsed
Optional: Fresh herbs like parsley or cilantro, for garnish
instructions: Sauté Vegetables: In a large pot, heat a drizzle of olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion, carrots, and celery and sauté until softened, about 5 minutes.

Add Lentils and Broth: Stir in the garlic, thyme, rosemary, and black pepper. Add the rinsed lentils and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Season and Serve: Season with salt to taste. If desired, garnish with fresh herbs before serving.
